messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] all
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Rebecca and other newcomers, Welcome! I ve been here since October. Since then this group has gone through a few changes. It used to be quite the happening
messages.messageBody:
Hi Rebecca and other newcomers,

Welcome! I've been here since October. Since then this group has gone through a few changes. It used to be quite the happening place! I'm not very sure why it has been so quiet lately. Even though the member number has risen, this must be due to newcomers lurking, waiting to see what everyone else is talking about. Probably a lot of people in this 600+ group have their mail set to "no mail" and check back occasionally. I'm kind of a lurker myself. ;-) But I get e-mails every day.

If you have any questions or basically anything at all you want to talk about, feel free to post. I think this group just needs people posting and maybe it can pick up again. That's why I've broken my silent mode today. :o)

Have a great unschooling day!

Karin







Rebecca Brown wrote:

I am very new to this group and was wondering if it is always this quiet? Rebecca

staclarspr@... wrote: Hello,

Has the list been really quite lately, as I have only seen a few posts
written?
Maybe we all need a little spring?

Linda



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] all
messages.msgSnippet: Welcome to all the new members!! I have not been posting at all . . . I am starting a new business that takes up most of my time. ..along with being with my
messages.messageBody:
Welcome to all the new members!! I have not been posting at all . . . I am
starting a new business that takes up most of my time. ..along with being
with my young people. Please feel free to post any questions, concerns you
may have, and people will respond if they have something to add to the
conversation. Also, the message boards at www.unschooling.com are a wealth of
wonderful and supportive information on unschooling if anyone is interested.

Living in Abundance
Mary
List Moderator

I know if a circumstance presents itself as not being loving in my life, then
it is a sign that I am bypassing love and that I am not looking out and being
loving from the
eyes of my heart.

messages.msgSnippet: I see that the emails are starting to come in, I want to remind everyone, to join in and show their support in the still standing post. subject line write
messages.messageBody:
I see that the emails are starting to come in, I want to remind everyone,
to join in and show their support in the still standing post.

subject line write Standing/and the name of your state
in the text just your name

It would be great to have everyone do this. It also introduces us to everyone
on the list.

messages.msgSnippet: ... Linda, you feel someone is reading the messages first and allowing on certain ones to go through? That was my question, and now I know the answer. Mine did
messages.messageBody:
>

Linda, you feel someone is reading the messages first and allowing on
certain ones to go through?

That was my question, and now I know the answer. Mine did go through.
Thank you for all of your help and direction to archives.

Please no more talk about moderation, because Lisa and Helen are needed
elsewhere right now.
Unschoolers..........lets get back to unschooling and supporting each other.

Linda
